> Gopher Guts
>

> Little birdies dirty feet,
> Great green globs of greasy grimy gopher guts,
> And I forgot my spoon!
>
> Great green gobs of greasy grimy gopher guts,
> Multilated monkey meat,
> Itsy bitsy birdie feet,
> French fried eye-balls,
> Rolling down a muddy street,
> And I forgot my spoon.
> (pause)
> But I got my straw!
>
> Great green gobs of greasy grimey gopher guts,
> Mutilated monkey meat,
> Saturated birdy feet,
> All wrapped up in

> And me without a spoon!
>
> Gee whiz! (but I've got a straw)

> Message: 4
> Date: Thu, 16 Mar 2000 08:22:27 -0800
> From: "Michelle L. Szpakowska-Harper" <earthmagik@...>
> Subject: Census, and Pi day
>
> We jumped on the pi day wagon...we thought it would be fun, and since my
son is 4 ....we considered fraction...1/2 pie...1/4 pie....you get 1/8 of
this pie....he helped make the pie crust, and we had blackberry, blueberry
strawberry, rasberry, mint pie, and we appreciate the wonderful, and fun
idea!!!!Thanks.
> We got the short form for the census...names, and birthdates, and
races.....SInce I am of the phylosophy....that I am a universal member of
this place in space....We all chose to put Other race.....Human......I don't
see what my race has to do with providing funding. If we all put the same
race, wouldn't we all get the same ammount? there would still be the same
ammount of people. I've always written other when filling out applications,
and the such...I just don't see the sense in asking this question , if your
not going to give a self described answer, and their isn't the space for
that. I consider myself Other than a category, and so I choose Other.
Michelle
>
>
>
____________________________________________________________________________
___
>
____________________________________________________________________________
___
